column4: ShawnRisk:I have my network card of broadcom b43xx seris. So i cant connect to my wifi. So i thought initially it is better to connect through lan but i cant connect with that also.I have done iwconfig
chances are you just need to download the firmware for your card and you will be good to go
look to the part that says "You are using the b43 driver from linux-2.6.25 or newer"
